urgent.action: Audit mobile site speed and UX immediately - run PageSpeed Insights, fix Core Web Vitals, ensure tap targets are 48px+, and test checkout/menu on mobile
urgent.reasoning: Mobile is only 20% of clicks for a LOCAL coffee shop in Waikiki where tourists browse on phones. This is catastrophically low - should be 60-70%.

urgent.action: Create dedicated Chinese landing page with compelling meta title/description targeting '夏威夷科纳咖啡' - current 0.3% CTR at position 5.5 is losing ~100 potential clicks/week
urgent.reasoning: 2955 impressions with only 8 clicks (0.27% CTR) at position 5.5. Chinese tourists searching for Kona coffee info - massive untapped market.

urgent.action: Fix http://www.konacoffeedonut.com/en showing separately from https version - implement proper 301 redirects to consolidate ranking signals
urgent.reasoning: HTTP and HTTPS versions appearing as separate pages in GSC splits authority and confuses Google. 112 impressions going to non-canonical URL.

quickWins.action: Rewrite Korean about-kona-coffee page meta title and description to be more compelling - currently position 4 with 0% CTR
quickWins.reasoning: Position 4 with 40 impressions but 0 clicks means terrible meta snippet. 15-minute fix could capture 10+ clicks/week from Korean tourists.

quickWins.keyword: 夏威夷科纳适合冲美式吗
quickWins.action: Create Chinese blog post answering 'Is Hawaiian Kona good for Americano?' - directly target this 776-impression query
quickWins.reasoning: 776 impressions at position 7.2 with 0 clicks. Creating targeted content could push to top 3 and capture informational searchers.

quickWins.action: Verify and fully optimize Google Business Profile - add all hours, photos, menu items, and ensure NAP consistency across web
quickWins.reasoning: Position 8.6 for 'coffee near me' with 0 clicks means GBP isn't optimized. Critical for Waikiki foot traffic.

quickWins.action: Add 'donuts in Waikiki' and 'best donuts Honolulu' to homepage H1/H2 tags and create dedicated donut menu page
quickWins.reasoning: Position 3 for 'donut' with only 2 impressions shows potential - need more donut-focused content to increase visibility.

opportunities.action: Build out full Chinese language section (/zh/) with localized content about Kona coffee origins, menu in Chinese, and tourist-friendly info (location from hotels, payment methods)
opportunities.reasoning: 3,731 impressions from Chinese queries (96% of total!) signals massive demand from Chinese tourists. Full localization could 10x traffic.

opportunities.action: Publish 'Grand Opening Feb 25, 2026' landing page and press release - target 'new coffee shop Waikiki' and 'Waikiki grand opening' keywords
opportunities.reasoning: Opening is TOMORROW. Time-sensitive content can capture local news searches and social buzz.

opportunities.action: Create content targeting 'best coffee Waikiki', 'Waikiki breakfast spots', 'coffee near Waikiki Beach' - currently not ranking for any tourist intent queries
opportunities.reasoning: Zero visibility for high-intent tourist queries. These keywords drive walk-in traffic from the 6M annual Waikiki visitors.

opportunities.action: Create Japanese language section - Japan shows 36 impressions with 0 clicks, indicating search demand from Japanese tourists
opportunities.reasoning: Japanese tourists are huge in Hawaii. Even small Japanese SEO effort could capture this underserved segment.

insights.observation: 96% of impressions come from Chinese language queries, but the site appears primarily English-focused
insights.suggestion: Pivot content strategy to prioritize Chinese market - they're actively searching for Kona coffee information

insights.observation: Brand keywords ('kona coffee donut') have 50% CTR at position 1 - excellent brand recognition building
insights.suggestion: Protect and expand brand presence - consider 'kona coffee donut menu', 'kona coffee donut hours' content

insights.observation: Desktop 40%, Mobile 20% split is inverted from typical local business (should be 70%+ mobile)
insights.suggestion: Suspect mobile UX issues or slow load times driving users away - prioritize mobile-first redesign

insights.observation: Chinese queries are informational ('what is Kona coffee flavor', 'good for Americano?') not transactional
insights.suggestion: Create educational content funnel: info content → menu/location pages → visit conversion

insights.observation: 20 clicks/week before opening is solid awareness building - mostly brand and Chinese educational queries
insights.suggestion: Track week-over-week after Feb 25 opening to measure local SEO and foot traffic correlation
